verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
You can have it all, Lord
Every part of my world
Take this life and breathe on
This heart that is now Yours

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Oh, the joy I've found
Surrendering my crowns
At the feet of the King
Who surrendered everything

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
And oh, the peace that comes
When I'm broken and undone
By Your unfailing grace
I can lift my voice and say

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
There is no greater call
Than giving You my all
I lay it all down
I lay it all down

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
There is no greater love
No higher name above
I lay it all down
I lay it all down
